snippet: The country’s new government is trying to shift blame for an attack that killed five Israeli tourists and their Bulgarian driver from Hezbollah, the militant Lebanese Shiite movement.
abstract: Bulgaria's new government is trying to shift blame for 2012 airport attack that killed five Israeli tourists away from Hezbollah, militant Lebanese Shiite movement.
lead_paragraph: The country’s new government is trying to shift blame for an attack that killed five Israeli tourists and their Bulgarian driver from Hezbollah, the militant Lebanese Shiite movement.

headline.seo: Bulgaria Tempers Blame for Hezbollah in Bombing
headline.main: Bulgaria Pulls Back on Blame for Hezbollah
headline.print_headline: Bulgaria Pulls Back on Blame For Hezbollah
